DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study to determine whether statin pretreatment decrease myocardial infarct size in patients with acute myocardial infarction undergoing primary percutaneous coronary intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Atorvastatin Administration Before Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
DOC.criteria: Presence of chest pain for more than 30 minutes but less than 12 hours after symptom onset ST segment elevation more than 1 mm in two or more contiguous leads or presumably a new onset left bundle branch blockage Cardiogenic shock History of myocardial infarction Chronic liver disease Previous or current statin use
